title: Re-eval Results
content:
For 6th sem students, do you know if anyone's grade increased from an A to an S in any core subjects or any electives?

Also specifically in Blockchain from B to A or any grade change? Please let me know, thank you.

comments.body: Did they release the re-evaluation results for 6th sem ?
They released for 4th and 6th i think. Don't know anyone who got a subject increase to S
But they haven't released a separate section yet for the subjects for which we submitted re-evaluation request  for 4th sem, like they usually do with re-evaluations
I'm 4th sem. I got an increase in a subject already
Oh, okay then I guess my money got wasted
It shows in provisional results in ESA results.
Idk it's just showing all the grades as it is and no separate mention  for the re-evaluated subjects. I had applied in my 1st sem and it showed the re-evaluated subjects separately
It's just showing paid in the challenge evaluation payment status nothing else
What does TAL mean it's showing on my result
u/rowlet-owl what does TAl mean, its showing on my result ?
They released it? How do you know?
Has anybody got a TAL for os ?

Ohh for me it was showing paid initially, then it got updated to verified and then the reval results came.

Maybe check with COE once.
Now it's showing TAL(to be announced later) for one of my subjects idlk why
u/rowlet-owl, they are showing TAL(To be Announced Later) for the subject in which I applied re-eval. Is it common as most of the people have got the results by now

You could have just DM'd me lol.

Yes, sometimes delays happen for multiple reasons. Don't stress. Just reach out to the COE for more details if you want to. Remember that re-eval results sometimes take almost a month or more.
i actually did all the re-eval procedure through email so maybe that's why they have delayed it.
